BRCA1.name: Olaparib (Lynparza)
BRCA1.description: PARP inhibitor particularly effective in BRCA-mutated cancers. Prevents DNA repair in cancer cells.

EGFR.name: Osimertinib (Tagrisso)
EGFR.description: EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitor effective against T790M resistance mutations in NSCLC.

HER2.name: Trastuzumab (Herceptin)
HER2.description: Monoclonal antibody targeting HER2 protein overexpressed in breast cancers.

PD-L1.name: Atezolizumab (Tecentriq)
PD-L1.description: PD-L1 inhibitor enhancing immune system response in NSCLC and triple-negative breast cancer.

KRAS.name: Sotorasib (Lumakras)
KRAS.description: KRAS G12C inhibitor used in NSCLC patients with specific KRAS mutation.

ALK.name: Alectinib (Alecensa)
ALK.description: Targeted therapy for ALK-positive NSCLC, crosses blood-brain barrier effectively.

PIK3CA.name: Alpelisib (Piqray)
PIK3CA.description: PI3K inhibitor used for advanced breast cancer with PIK3CA mutation.
